snippet: In rebel-held areas of northern Mali, teams that remove worms and teach villagers how to protect drinking water have been unable to operate since April.
lead_paragraph: In rebel-held areas of northern Mali, teams that remove worms and teach villagers how to protect drinking water have been unable to operate since April.

headline.seo: Mali Violence Slows Guinea Worm Disease Eradication
headline.main: Fighting in Mali Hampers Guinea Worm Disease Eradication
headline.print_headline: Fighting in Mali Hampers Guinea Worm Disease Eradication
